New Records: West Indies scored their highest total in a men's T20 World Cup match with 218 for 5.
Azmatullah Omarzai leaked a world record 36 runs in an over.
Nicholas Pooran surpassed Chris Gayle to become the leading six-hitter for West Indies in T20Is.
West Indies finished the group stage with a perfect record.
Key Match Events: Obed McCoy took 3 wickets for 14 runs.
Rashid Khan was dismissed by Andre Russell for 18 runs.
Gulbadin Naib took 2 wickets for 14 runs.
Ibrahim Zadran scored 38 runs for Afghanistan.
Azmatullah Omarzai bowled the joint most expensive over in T20Is, conceding 36 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet.
West Indies registered their second-biggest win in T20 World Cups by runs.
Afghanistan's middle order averaged a mere 19.71 coming into the match.
Romario Shepherd missed the match due to the birth of his second child.
